name: Kabuki Rising: Shadows Beyond
description:
A game produced at APU by Zachary Gomez.

Contact: zqgomez18@apu.edu

*Game is currently only 1/3rd finished, updates will come out*

Retake castle Kizumi by getting rid of the impending undead ninja menace!

The main character is Yamagata Tsukiko,  A local, living nearby Castle Kizumi as a housekeeper. While fleeing the undead he discovered a gift from the future in front of his house... GUNS! The Undead wont know what hit them with these newfound weapons of destruction.

Defeat all of the Undead to get to the next level while keeping a eye out for Ammunition.

Controls: 

Walk WASD 

Run: Hold SHIFT 

Jump: SPACEBAR 

Select Weapons: 1,2,3 / Scroll Wheel

Shoot: Left Click

Aim: Right Click

Pause: Esc
